resources.string: Some authors claim that intelligence services effectively used Stroop test to detect envoys. My App tests how good you are in hiding languages you can read. %nYour goal would be to identify the colour of the letters each of words presented is written with and press the corresponding button. Try to do it as soon as you can! %nAfter a short testing sequence of words in Klingon, Elvish and Dothraki a real test starts. Do the same as you did in testing sequence and I will try to guess your mother tongue. Enjoy my App! %nP.S. It is believed that doing Stroop test daily may improve your cognitive abilities.
